name: Finally Awake (short-games)
description:
hey, i'm the developer and i'm so excited to release my first game. i have already wrote in the game but i know there are huge issue and inefficent problem but that's my first solo game so please be polite ;)

this is the chapter 0 of my story so as soon as possible i will work on further chapters and release them here or on steam.

enjoy this 3 minutes videogame :)
